meanings.sent1: She subordinating her needs to those of her family.
meanings.sent2: The manager subordinating the tasks to different departments.
meanings.sent3: The cat subordinating itself to the whims of its human owner.
meanings.sent4: The sun subordinating the moon in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's authority was subordinating in the classroom.

meanings.definition: To place in a lower order or rank.
meanings.sent1: He subordinating his desires to the needs of the team.
meanings.sent2: The company subordinating the new employee to a lower position.
meanings.sent3: The tree subordinating its branches to the trunk for support.
meanings.sent4: The river subordinating its tributaries in the flow.
meanings.sent5: The chef subordinating the side dishes to the main course.
